long_description: Show your treehugger inclinations with the Columbia Wood Heart T-Shirt for women. The graphic shows a tree-ring slice in a heart shape. Polyester/cotton/rayon blend keeps you comfy under a wide range of weather conditions. Polyester aids a quick drying time; cotton breathes naturally. Columbia Wood Heart T-Shirt features a V-neck, close fit and cap sleeves.
short_description: Show your treehugger inclinations with the Columbia Wood Heart T-Shirt for women. The graphic shows a tree-ring slice in a heart shape.
